summary: This appears to be a text message or email exchange referencing a Daily Mail article about Prince Andrew's sex accuser and a list of 170 people linked to Jeffrey Epstein. The sender mocks Daniel Bates about his relationships with David Boies and Alan Dershowitz, suggesting they will testify under oath.

persons.name: Daniel Bates
persons.role: Recipient of message, referenced in Daily Mail article
persons.context: Addressed in a mocking message that references his relationships with David Boies and Alan Dershowitz and suggests he will testify under oath.

persons.name: David Boies
persons.context: Mentioned as someone Daniel Bates allegedly calls every morning, with the implication of being involved in coordinated efforts related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Mentioned alongside David Boies as someone Daniel Bates allegedly communicates with regularly; a picture of Bates and Dershowitz is referenced as an attachment.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Referenced in the Daily Mail article link regarding a sex accuser and people linked to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure in the case; the Daily Mail article mentions 170 people linked to him.

connections.description: Implied close relationship with regular communication, possibly coordinating on legal or media matters related to Epstein.
Referenced together in a picture attachment; implied association through shared connections in the Epstein case context.
Both are attorneys mentioned in the same context as being in communication with Daniel Bates about Epstein-related matters.

events.title: Message exchange referencing Daily Mail article
events.description: A message was sent mocking Daniel Bates about his relationships with attorneys Boies and Dershowitz, referencing a Daily Mail article about Prince Andrew's accuser and Epstein-linked individuals.

keyFacts: A Daily Mail article from December 2023 reported that a judge ruled 170 people linked to Jeffrey Epstein would be named.
The message suggests Daniel Bates has close relationships with attorneys David Boies and Alan Dershowitz and implies coordination on Epstein-related matters.
The sender indicates that Daniel Bates will testify under oath about his relationship with Boies and his role in Epstein case matters.
